statements: SELECT * FROM hydropower_performance_data;
SELECT turbine_id, turbine_name, generator_name, performance_rating FROM hydropower_performance_data;
SELECT turbine_id, generator_id, status FROM hydropower_performance_data WHERE status='Active';
SELECT generator_id, generator_name, last_maintenance_date FROM hydropower_performance_data WHERE last_maintenance_date<'2022-01-01';
SELECT turbine_name, performance_rating FROM hydropower_performance_data ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 500 ORDER BY turbine_id DESC
SELECT turbine_name, generator_name FROM hydropower_performance_data WHERE status = 'Active' AND last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT turbine_id, turbine_name, generator_name FROM hydropower_performance_data ORDER BY turbine_name ASC, generator_id DESC
SELECT * FROM hydropower_performance_data WHERE generator_name LIKE '%A%' OR status = 'Inactive'
SELECT turbine_id, turbine_name, generator_id, generator_name, status FROM hydropower_performance_data WHERE performance_rating < 300
SELECT * FROM turbines;
SELECT turbine_name, location FROM turbines WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ';
SELECT turbine_name, manufacturer, install_date FROM turbines ORDER BY install_date DESC;
SELECT generator_name, power_output FROM generators WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM turbines WHERE location IN ('New York', 'California');
SELECT * FROM turbines WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT turbine_name, manufacturer FROM turbines WHERE turbine_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT generator_name, power_output FROM generators WHERE efficiency > 90;
SELECT turbine_name, manufacturer, install_date FROM turbines ORDER BY install_date DESC;
SELECT t.turbine_name, g.generator_name, g.power_output FROM turbines t JOIN generators g ON t.turbine_id = g.turbine_id WHERE t.location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM Turbines;
SELECT turbine_name, location FROM Turbines WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT generator_id, capacity, efficiency FROM Generators ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY power_output DESC;
SELECT data_id, power_output, efficiency FROM PerformanceData WHERE generator_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Turbines
SELECT turbine_name, location FROM Turbines ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT manufacturer, capacity FROM Turbines WHERE location='USA'
SELECT generator_id, capacity, efficiency FROM Generators ORDER BY capacity ASC
SELECT timestamp, power_output FROM PerformanceData WHERE efficiency > 0.8
SELECT * FROM turbines;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM turbines ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT id, capacity FROM turbines WHERE manufacturer='ACME';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT generator_id, timestamp, efficiency FROM performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, capacity FROM turbines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM generators WHERE output > 500 AND turbine_id = 2 ORDER BY type DESC;
SELECT description, log_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE generator_id = 3 AND log_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, capacity, type, output FROM turbines JOIN generators ON turbines.id = generators.turbine_id WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC' OR type = 'Electric';
SELECT generator_id, timestamp, efficiency FROM performance_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Turbines;
SELECT turbine_name, capacity FROM Turbines ORDER BY turbine_name DESC;
SELECT status, generator_name FROM Generators WHERE turbine_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM Locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE turbine_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Turbines;
SELECT turbine_name, capacity FROM Turbines WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city, country FROM Locations WHERE city LIKE 'New%' OR city LIKE 'San%' ORDER BY country ASC;

SELECT mr.record_id, mr.maintenance_date, tr.turbine_name, gr.generator_name FROM MaintenanceRecords mr LEFT JOIN Turbines tr ON mr.turbine_id = tr.turbine_id LEFT JOIN Generators gr ON mr.generator_id = gr.generator_id WHERE mr.maintenance_type = 'Routine' ORDER BY mr.maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT pd.date_time, pd.power_output, tr.turbine_name, gr.generator_name FROM PerformanceData pd LEFT JOIN Turbines tr ON pd.turbine_id = tr.turbine_id LEFT JOIN Generators gr ON pd.generator_id = gr.generator_id WHERE pd.power_output > 100 ORDER BY pd.date_time ASC;
